# external Directory Architecture

## Overview
This document summarizes the top-level, git-tracked contents of `external`.

## Top-level entries
### Directories (7)
- `bsd/`
- `gpl2/`
- `gpl3/`
- `historical/`
- `lgpl3/`
- `mit/`
- `public-domain/`

### Files (3)
- `Makefile`
- `README`
- `arch.md`

## Notes
- Entries listed are tracked in git; untracked and ignored files are omitted.
- Log files (`*.log` and `*.log.*`) and `_tmp` directories are intentionally excluded.
- VCS metadata directories (.git, .hg, .svn, .bzr) are omitted.
